title: Regulation (EEC) No 431/68 of the Council of 9 April 1968 determining the standard quality for raw sugar and fixing the Community frontier crossing point for calculating c.i.f. prices for sugar
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 431/68 OF THE COUNCIL  of 9 April 1968  determining the standard quality for raw sugar and fixing the Community frontier crossing point for calculating c.i.f. prices for sugar
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Community frontier crossing point referred to in Article 13 (3) of Regulation No 1009/67/EEC shall be Rotterdam.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 9 April 1968.
For the Council
The President
E. FAURE  1OJ No 308, 18.12.1967, p. 1.
